PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-11702014-10-30,  ,  TBS,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Superannuation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Supplementary Death Benefit Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SUPPLEMENTARY DEATH BENEFIT REGULATIONS in order to (1) add Canadian Nuclear Laboratories Ltd. (CNLL) to Schedule III of the Regulations; and (2) ensure that there is no change to the death benefit coverage for those employees who will be re-organized from Atomic Energy of Canada Ltd. to CNLL.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0249 Publication Date: 2014-11-19
AttachmentsAttachment
